name: BigAR - Poké Card Scanner
description:
BigAR Poké TCG is an app for Pokémon™ TCG players - It provides easy access to card image and price from MagicCardMarket.eu or TCGPlayer.com of every Pokémon™ card just by scanning them.

Now also featuring deck creation, with side and extra deck, and export options.

We're developing a collection manager with the ability to create multiple decks.

Prices and images are provided by MagicCardMarket.eu or TCGPlayer.com

Pokémon card images and character names are trademarks of Nintendo. All rights reserved. This app is unaffiliated.
